item.description:

item.title: Holmdale Terrace (Hackney Borough end), 6th January
item.description:
The Hackney end of Holmdale Terrace (above Vartry Road) is covered in litter on the railway side fence. Please can this receive a street clean (behind Stamford Hill railway station).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Holmdale Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food/abandoned rubbish, 6th January
item.description:
Food is thrown on the floor from the fast food shop, Swift, plastic forks, plastic take-away boxes. It's disgusting. Neighbours leaving rubbish in the street. There is a school, The Academy on Furrow Lane, families living in that street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Furrow Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo health hazard, 6th January
item.description:
There are sacks buckets and bags of dog mess outside the the back gate near canal, 176 whinchat road . This has been going on for sometime please address

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whinchat Road, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Cabmen’s Shelter, 6th January
item.description:
The drain outside the Cabmen’s Shelter is blocked. It has been reported before but response was ‘no further action needed’. Now the water that runs out freezes over, and causes a slip hazard. Please attend for public safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Russell Square, Bloomsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding and ice on pavement at bus stop, 6th January
item.description:
Flooding on pavement , water coming up. Half of pavement frozen there. Several people have fallen over this morning getting on/ off buses
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rheola Close, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Icy pavements outside Bishop Justus school, 6th January
item.description:
The pavements outside of the school have not been treated with salt or grit and and are sheet ice. Kids are slipping and falling on their way to school. It is only a matter of time before someone is seriously hurt. Please treat urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement looks like an earthquake has hit, it's incredibly dangerous, 6th January
item.description:
A heavy vehicle has damaged the pavement and crossover. The tarmac looks like a earthquake has damaged the road - this has resulted in us not being able to use our driveway and it also means that pedestrians needs to walk in to a dangerous road in order to get past the damage. Please repair this ASAP as it is a major issue and it is going to cause somebody to get run over or a crash as cars have to swerve to avoid the damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birchwood Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Please remove

item.title: Abandoned bins fly tipping outside Bellingham station been there 6 weeks now!, 6th January
item.description:
Abandoned bins fly tipping outside Bellingham station been there 6 weeks now! Previously reported at least 6 weeks ago and no action taken. Please remove @lewishamcouncil #lewishamcouncil attracting vermin and further fly tipping

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Randlesdown Road, Southend, Greater London

item.title: Black ice on bridge pathway, 6th January
item.description:
The bridge is treacherous as it’s steep on either side and in this very cold snap it’s been like this for a few days the Friends have been asked to pit grit down- sadly we don’t have access to any
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bailes Place, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
